name: copilot-money-mcp
description: AI-powered personal finance queries using local Copilot Money data. Query transactions, analyze spending, and track accounts with natural language.

tools.name: get_transactions
tools.description: Get transactions with optional filters for date ranges, category, merchant, account, amount, pending status, and region/country

tools.name: get_accounts
tools.description: Get all accounts with balances, optionally filter by account type (checking, savings, credit, investment)

tools.name: get_spending
tools.description: Unified spending aggregation tool.

tools.name: get_account_balance
tools.description: Get balance and details for a specific account by ID

tools.name: get_categories
tools.description: Get all categories found in transactions with human-readable names, transaction counts, and total amounts

tools.name: get_recurring_transactions
tools.description: Identify recurring/subscription charges with frequency, monthly cost, confidence score, and next expected charge date

tools.name: get_budgets
tools.description: Get budgets from Copilot's native budget tracking.

tools.name: get_goals
tools.description: Get financial goals from Copilot's native goal tracking.

tools.name: get_income
tools.description: Get income transactions (deposits, paychecks, refunds) with total income and breakdown by source

tools.name: compare_periods
tools.description: Compare spending and income between two time periods with totals, percentage changes, and category-by-category comparison

tools.name: get_trips
tools.description: Detect and group transactions into trips with location, duration, total spent, and category breakdown

tools.name: get_merchant_analytics
tools.description: Unified merchant analytics tool.

tools.name: get_unusual_transactions
tools.description: Detect unusual/anomalous transactions significantly above average for merchant or category

tools.name: export_transactions
tools.description: Export transactions to CSV or JSON format for external analysis

tools.name: get_data_quality_report
tools.description: Generate comprehensive data quality report to identify issues like unresolved categories, currency conversion problems, duplicate accounts, and suspicious categorizations. Supports configurable transaction limits (up to 100K) and pagination for large datasets.

tools.name: get_investment_prices
tools.description: Get current/latest prices for investments (stocks, crypto, ETFs).

tools.name: get_investment_splits
tools.description: Get stock splits for investments.

tools.name: get_connected_institutions
tools.description: Get connected financial institutions (Plaid items).

tools.name: get_average_transaction_size
tools.description: Calculate average transaction amounts grouped by category or merchant.

tools.name: get_category_trends
tools.description: Track spending trends by category, comparing current vs previous period.

tools.name: get_budget_analytics
tools.description: Unified budget analytics tool.

tools.name: get_investment_analytics
tools.description: Unified investment analytics tool.

tools.name: get_portfolio_allocation
tools.description: Get portfolio allocation across investment accounts and securities.

tools.name: get_goal_analytics
tools.description: Unified goal analytics tool.

tools.name: get_goal_details
tools.description: Get goal details with optional includes.

tools.name: get_goal_milestones
tools.description: Track goal milestone achievements (25%, 50%, 75%, 100%).

tools.name: get_account_analytics
tools.description: Unified account analytics tool.

tools.name: get_year_over_year
tools.description: Compare spending and income year-over-year.
